comment.author: 12698671@N02
comment._content: Thanks so much for preserving this. Darwin whitehouse is one of my top favorite deceased photographers.

comment.realname: Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County
comment.author: 25960495@N06
comment._content: His father, Bion Whitehouse, was a Keene N.H. photographer, and we are scanning and uploading hundreds of his photos to the Commons on Flickr. I wasn't aware that Darwin was a photographer too...
comment.authorname: Keene and Cheshire County (NH) Historical Photos
